description: A long blade imbued with time magic.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 1.6 armor, 10 attack speed and 0.5% movement speed.
For agility heroes, it grants 1.6 armor, 10 attack speed, 0.5% movement speed and 10 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 1.6 armor, 10 attack speed and 0.5% movement speed.
